featured.title: qpAdm Genomic Modeling on AWS
featured.description: MSc thesis project automating genomic analysis at scale
featured.problem: Manual genomic modeling was time-consuming and lacked cost-performance insights across different AWS instance types.
featured.approach: Built automated benchmarking pipeline with Terraform-provisioned EC2 Auto Scaling Groups (c7g/m7g/r7g Graviton3), implementing failure recovery, CloudWatch alerting, and S3 artifact versioning. Applied ML-driven optimization using scikit-learn regression.
outcomes: Executed 15,000+ qpAdm runs with structured logs
Reduced iterations by 40% through ML-driven optimization

featured.title: WhatsTheCraic: Event Management Platform
featured.description: Microservices platform for event discovery and management
featured.problem: Need for scalable, multi-service architecture handling event creation, user management, and real-time analytics.
featured.approach: Architected microservices platform with 4 containerized Node.js services on ECS Fargate behind ALB path routing. Implemented Aurora multi-AZ, S3 presigned uploads, and SQS/SNS notifications with idempotent processing. Deployed React via AWS Amplify with GitHub Actions CI/CD.

featured.title: Statify - Spotify Analytics Tool
featured.description: Flask-based web application analyzing Spotify user listening statistics
featured.problem: Users wanted insights into their Spotify listening habits, favorite artists, and personalized recommendations with visual representations.
featured.approach: Developed full-stack application integrating Spotify API with OAuth authentication. Created dynamic data visualizations for user engagement insights including top songs, favorite artists, top genres, and recommendations.
outcomes: Built full-stack application with Spotify API integration
Created dynamic visualizations for music analytics
